item.title: Backend / Full-Stack Developer
item.description:
Mission Connection

As a Backend/Full-Stack Developer, you’ll be at the core of our mission to transform how organizations manage security through the perfect balance of People, Process, and Technology. You’ll build the systems that power our Wingman platform, with a focus on implementing AI capabilities and creating intuitive user interfaces.

Role Overview

You’ll design and build the systems that power our Wingman platform, with a focus on implementing AI capabilities and creating intuitive user interfaces. You’ll work closely with our security experts to translate complex security concepts into elegant technical solutions that help our customers achieve better security outcomes.

item.title: Client Success Security Consultant
item.description:
Mission Connection

As a Client Success Security Consultant, you’ll be at the forefront of Peak Defence’s mission to transform security management through the perfect integration of People, Process, and Technology. You’ll work directly with clients to implement our methodology, ensuring they achieve meaningful security outcomes rather than just checking compliance boxes.

Role Overview

Unlike traditional consultants who primarily give advice, you’ll be hands-on in implementing solutions, driving adoption of our methodology, and ensuring clients achieve measurable security improvements. You’ll work across the entire security lifecycle: from initial assessment through implementation, optimization, and ongoing management.
